Sentencas: Lanthanum gallate with partial substitutions for strontium and magnesium shows higher ionic conductivity than traditional ionic conductors such as yttria-stabilized zirconia (8YSZ), and has been considered for application as solid electrolyte and electrode in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells operating at intermediate temperatures (500-700 degrees C).
Titulo: Influence of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia on Microstructure and Electrical Properties of Doped Lanthanum Gallate

Sentencas: Parallel to the development of new solid electrolytes, improvement of the already known electrolytes has been one goal.
Titulo: Influence of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia on Microstructure and Electrical Properties of Doped Lanthanum Gallate

Sentencas: In this work, the effects of adding 8YSZ to La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-delta (LSGM), on the microstructure and electrical performance were investigated.
Titulo: Influence of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia on Microstructure and Electrical Properties of Doped Lanthanum Gallate

Sentencas: Compound electrolytes consisting of up to 20 wt.% 8YSZ were prepared by solid state reactions.
Titulo: Influence of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia on Microstructure and Electrical Properties of Doped Lanthanum Gallate

Sentencas: Sintered pellets with up to 10 wt.% 8YSZ achieved near full density after sintering at 1450 degrees C and reduction in the fraction of impurity phases.
Titulo: Influence of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia on Microstructure and Electrical Properties of Doped Lanthanum Gallate

Sentencas: Addition of 8YSZ promoted grain growth to LSGM.
Titulo: Influence of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia on Microstructure and Electrical Properties of Doped Lanthanum Gallate

Sentencas: The higher ionic conductivity was obtained for 1 wt.% 8YSZ addition with slight decrease of the apparent activation energy.
Titulo: Influence of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia on Microstructure and Electrical Properties of Doped Lanthanum Gallate
